duties_responsibilities.duty: Review, redline, and negotiate a variety of corporate vendor agreements such as Professional Service Agreements, Fixed Price Agreements, Time & Materials arrangements, Software license agreements, SaaS Agreements, Outsourcing agreements, Non-Disclosure Agreements, Master purchasing agreements, and Contract amendments.
Develop and negotiate standard contract guidelines for vendor service levels and adherence to established industry KPI's and metrics.

education_certification.credential: College degree preferred. Field of study/academic qualifications are less important than lengthy diverse experience with a variety of vendor contract types and corporate contract & vendor management and negotiations.
